title: Bug 109718: Put large content in text item, the tips shows the content in one line
description: INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGE DOESN'T HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR USER TO IDENTIFY THE ERROR. 42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT 42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER 42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTION 42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION 52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTRATE THE UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS 53. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put mouse on the text item Expected Result: Tips should be shown in the given format. Actual Result: Tips are shown in one line.
OB: When a large amount of content is put in a text item and the mouse is placed on the text item, the tips (tooltip) is shown with the content in a single line.
EB: The tips (tooltip) should show the content in its original format, with line breaks and formatting maintained.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Put a large amount of content in a text item.
3. Hover the mouse over the text item.
4. Observe the tips (tooltip) that is displayed. It should show the content in its original format, with line breaks and formatting maintained.
